title: Winter Sausage Manufacturing Co. Recalls Poultry and Meat Products due to Misbranding
summary: WASHINGTON, June 14, 2018 Winter Sausage Manufacturing Co, an Eastpointe, Mich. establishment, is recalling approximately 28,346 pounds of poultry, pork, and beef products due to misbranding, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The poultry products were slaughtered under...
